title: Help me
body: I'm new and I have no idea how to get Riot Points and Influence Point

replies.body:
It's not a lot to go over, but I really feel the [Reward IP Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824) would break it down in detail for you when it comes to IP! RP on the other hand can be purchased within the client store, gifted from friends, or depending on what Region RP cards.  

If you have any questions shoot them at me and i'll be happy to help you out.
